chess.unmatched: `{{origin}}` error: `{{value}}` format error or out of range.

color.invalid: `{{origin}}` error: `{{value}}` is not in the list of selectable colors.

language.invalid: `{{origin}}` error: `{{value}}` is not in the list of selectable languages.

robot.invalid: `{{origin}}` error: `{{value}}` is not a valid robot operation.

body.play_game_by_command: Reply to the current issue with the following command to participate in the game:
body.only_creator_can_use: Only the room owner can use this command.
body.chess_command_description: `chess:x:y` Set the piece position, for example: `chess:1:a` means placing a piece in row 1 column a.
body.color_command_description: `color:color_name` Set the piece color, Selectable colors: {{colors}}.
body.robot_command_description: `robot:mode` Set the robot mode. `robot:add` Join the robot, `robot:remove` Remove the robot.

reply.room_full: The room is full, unable to join!
reply.wait_opponent_move: You have placed a piece at {{ox}}:{{oy}}, please wait for the opponent's move.
reply.position_occupied: `{{login}}` has already placed a piece at {{ox}}:{{oy}}, please choose again.
reply.color_change_failed: You are not in the room, unable to change piece color.
reply.color_used: `{{color}}` has already been used, please choose again.
reply.game_room_created: @{{login}} Game room created: Click link [{{name}}]({{url}}) to join.
reply.language_change_failed: Only the room owner can change the language.
reply.room_has_robot_add_failed: The room already has a robot, no need to add.
reply.room_full_add_robot_failed: The room is full, unable to add a robot.
reply.game_start_remove_robot_failed: The game has started, unable to remove the robot.
